It has a sign that if you park and you are not a customer you pay 6e, he also told us that if you drink something later, it will be discounted. It is guarded with cameras. You can park in the upstairs or downstairs area, we arrived very late and moved downstairs to shower. We slept upstairs with no problem.

title: (07011) - 30 Diseminado 2801- Son Flor
description: It is a dissuasive parking used even by locals. There are several bus stops for different lines, both go to the city. At the top is number 8 and direction Decathlon, there is another stop. This is 10 minutes by bus or less from the center. And if you have bicycles, It is much better, since from here you access the bicycle lane and even the center...

title: (07610) Palma - 44 Carrer Prol Denton
description: It is a parking area attached to the beach, passing cars. It is a street with access to the promenade that runs through the entire bay of Palma. The can beach is very close so it is ideal if you travel with dogs. I recommend this car park only if you want to be close to Palma.

title: (07610) Can Pastilla - 3 Carrer de Cèsar
description: Launderette 12kg, 16kg, 15 minutes drying.

title_short: (07610) Can Pastilla - 9A Carrer de les Nanses

title: (07012) Palma - 8 Camí de l'Escullera

title: (07360) Lloseta - 3 Carrer Sabaters

description: 4 hectares of land with common services (toilets, showers, electricity, water, sewage, collector). bike rental. 2 km from Playa del Arenal and the airport 4). 24 hours all year.Visit us on facebook.Camp4cycle. However, it is a problem to get onto the pitch! There was no one there. Friendly camper colleagues let us on the pitch.

title: (07014) Palma - 2B Avinguda de Gabriel Roca
description: Free parking, with trees and lots of shade. Next to the main road, ie cars passing, for sensitive ears not good for sleeping (with earplugs all ok). A 28 minute walk to the cathedral.

title: (07170) Valldemossa - 13 Avinguda Palma
description: Parking fee not closed. Old town nearby. No special services. Good for a night in a small van. Active municipal police therefore pay parking.

title: (07360) Lloseta - 1E Carrer Frederic García Lorca

title: (07170) Valldemossa - 11C Avinguda Palma

title: (07170) Valldemossa - 12 Carrer Josep Coll Bardolet
description: Quiet parking in a street away from the center but 5 minutes from it. The review near the cemetery was closed for works so we found this site. There are several streets around with the option of parking but with a lot of inclination. This was towards the end quite level.

title: (07600) Palma - 26 Avinguda de Fra Joan Llabrés
title_short: (07600) Palma - 26 Avinguda de Fra Joan Llabrés
description: Along the road. Spent a relatively quiet night. From 6:00 a.m. it gets loud with car traffic. Some relatively flat. You have to stand very close to the curb, otherwise you will be outside the markings. Megapark, Ballermann 6, Bierkönig, Upper Bavaria and the beach can all be reached in about 6 minutes on foot. There are restaurants nearby

title: (07600) Palma - 3 Carrer Duna
description: Ballermann in 5 minutes, park in the head of a dead end

title: (07170) Valldemossa - 201 Calle Venerable Sor Aina

title: (07014) Palma - Carrer Castell de Bellver
description: Good site to visit the castle

title: (07190) Esporles - 4 Carrer de s'Hort
description: Space for about 6 AC / Campers at the entrance of the town of Esporles. Very quiet, we have spent one night in a camper. Facing the road, a little busy especially at the beginning of the day. Civil Guard passed by and didn't say anything to us.

title: (07100) Sóller - s/n Plaça d'Espanya
description: Public toilets in the station. open even on Sundays. there are two sets of toilets, in the lobby and also up the stairs.

title: (07100) Sóller - 159 Carretera de Desviament
description: Parking along the road where the botanical gardens is.  On a hill and quite a busy road but wide parking either side, perfect for motor homes. Very close to the town center so perfect for the day.  Could also park at night but lots of cars as main road.

title: (07015) Palma - 44D Avinguda de Gabriel Roca
description: Parking in the blue zone in front of the port, ideal if you have to board the ferry early in the morning Flat and quiet area You can use the port toilets, open all night and quite clean

title: (07100) Sóller - 2 Camí des Camp Llarg
description: Possibility of emptying your gray water (only) in the washing station. I simply asked the owner politely and with a smile (car garage next door) and he gave me permission. He didn't ask me anything but on principle, I gave him a small gift. Use your good manners because there is nothing mandatory…

title: (07170) Valldemossa - 43 Ma-10
description: Free drinking water, to the right of the air pressure and water column is a garden hose that was allowed to be used.

title: (07100) Sóller - 30 Ma-11
description: drinking water filling

title: (07190) Esporles - 92 Carrer de Joan Riutort
description: Parking on both sides of calle ca l'onclo. Left of the ground, small, but no markings, for any size. To the right very large but only passenger cars. Close to the main road and the town.

title: (07100) Sóller - 7 Carrer d'Adela Olivér Llinás
description: Parking with ORA but it is large enough to leave vans

title: (07179) - 23C Carrer Arxiduc Luís Salvador

title: (07179) Deià - 34E Carrer Arxiduc Luís Salvador
description: Parking on the road entering Deià. Comfortable to spend the night.

title: (07179) Deià - 5 Carrer Es Clot
description: Possibility of showering with hot water in the Can Boi refuge for a fee. Good service and attention.

title: (07369) Selva - Unnamed Road
description: Public park, with about 7 tables and grills to spend the day and it is possible to stay at night, access is by a dirt road with stones, but it can be done slowly and easily. Not very suitable for large caravans. lots of tree shade and place for hammocks

title: (07015) Palma - 95 Carrer de Francesc Vidal i Sureda
title_short: (07015) Palma - 95 Carrer de Francesc Vidal i Sureda
description: Street parking 700m from the Mirò museum and 50m from the stop for lines 46 and 47 which takes you to the port and downtown in 20 min. a bit busy but in the shade.

address.street: 95 Carrer de Francesc Vidal i Sureda

title: (07100) Sóller - 2 Carretera Deyà
description: Perfect for a peaceful sleep.

title: (07015) Palma - 227 Avinguda de Joan Miró
description:
Very spacious place next to Palacio de Marivent wall.
Capacity for more than 40 vehicles. Shaded area and for all sizes and heights of Motorhomes.
Nearby supermarkets and Porto Pi Shopping Center next door. Good communication. Parking day and night.

title: (07190) Esporles - 89 Diseminado Pol 9
description: Zona Recreativa. Very good shady place to spend the night in a van. Trees for laying a hammock and tables for eating. A playground ideal for children and quite large. I highly recommend

title: (07179) Deià - 1A Carretera Sóller
description: Parking on the road. 4 spaces very close to Deià some inclination

title: (07300) Inca - 7 Carrer de Salvador Espriu
description: Parking for the municipal swimming pool, next to a large playground for children, you can buy a pass for a few hours in the pool and the possibility of showers. There is a cafeteria right next to it and a starting area for the Tramuntana. Area with life during the day and at night, very quiet with police presence.

title: (07015) Palma - 4 Carretera Dic de l'Oest
description: Free parking next to the port, next to cliff overlooking the sea.

title: (07179) Deià - 8 Carrer Francisco Mas
description: Parking very close to Deia. Perfect to go to dinner to the people taking a walk. In the morning if you get up early you can go down to the cove, where you can also spend the night. Very careful with the size of your vehicle that people park next to the road of the cove and the exit and entry is very complicated. Better to enter and leave at the first or last hour.

title: (07210) Algaida - 12 Carrer sa Serradora
description: center car park

title: (07600) El Arenal - 303 Diseminado Sector 6
description: Water intake next to the laundry room, it is a typical gas station tap but with enough pressure. Very nice staff who, when asked if they could fill the tank, responded: of course, that's what it's for!?

title: (07190) Son Trias - Unnamed Road
description: Mineral water fountain to which locals go with bottles for its excellent quality

title: (07170) Valldemossa - Ma-1131
description: 1 flat and one sloping for van by the roadside. At the foot of the climbing routes and with a breathtaking view of the sea and the port of Valdemossa. Tourist traffic during the day.

title: (07170) Valldemossa - 5 Carrer Ermita Joan Mir
description: Very narrow road, you can pass by car or van. very quiet parking we have spent the night great, there are bathrooms and stone tables for picnic

title: (07600) El Arenal - 21 Carrer Balears
description: Cheap place to do laundry. I recommend it!

title: (07179) Deià - 6 Diseminado Valldemossa Cr
description:
Small parking in nature for the most part along the quietest route on the road that leads to deia cove.
Accesa be a little Tricky, Good turning possibility

title: (07015) Palma -
description: Viewpoint with privileged views of Palma and the port. Quite quiet from 12:00 - 1:00 since cars usually come before to watch the sunset and be with friends. We spent a very quiet night here.

title: (07210) Algaida - 111 Diseminado es Porrassar
description: Parking lot on the outskirts of Algaida, quiet area,

title: (07300) Inca - 50 Carrer Joan d'Austria
description: Economic Diesel station, non-potable water?, bathrooms, and car wash.

title: (07600) Llucmajor - 23 Carrer Antoni Galmés
description: Having lived in El Arenal for several years, I know that there was always this parking lot. Actually there are 3 parking lots and in them there is AC and vans too. This one is wider and is better inclined, it also has a fence that gives more security. IS FREE. We have spent several nights and super quiet.

title: (07300) Inca - 122 Carrer Joan d'Austria
description: Very good place to visit Inca, big esplanade and with trees for shade, if not busy there is a cupboard with a tap, a lot of cars and trucks etc there are room for everyone

title: (07100) Sóller - 94 Ma-11
description: Drinking water source in the same roundabout from Soller Pueblo to Soller Puerto. If you park nearby you can even fill with a hose if not, with water cans.

title: (07170) Nova Valldemossa - Ma-10
description: Small parking lot. Perfect sea view. Very quiet street.

title: (07100) Soller - 33 Diseminado Poligon 2
description: Very quiet area to spend the night. At night there may be some boys from the village chatting but they leave early and make little noise. In the town there are numerous fountains where you can fill water. And at the Repsol gas station you can fill water without limit.

title: (07179) Deià - 5 Carrer Sa Cala
description: Parking at Cala Deia, possible to stay overnight, free from 7 p.m. to 9 a.m., great to be the last in the water and the first in the morning !!

title: (07109) Fornalutx - 14 Avenida Arbona Colom
description: Parking at the entrance of the town on the right. Somewhat inclined so it's perfect for visiting the village

title: (07179) Deià - 13 Diseminado Valldemossa Cr
description: This place is just right next to the starting point if you are planning for a walk to “Sa Foradada”. Even you are not planning for the walk, you have to come and see the amazing subset just 1 min walk from here. There is a bar next and public toilet. Plenty of space for parking (enough for around 30 cars). At night most of the cars left so it is quiet and perfect to sleep.

title: (07179) -
description: Rest area on a little traveled road at night. It is an old stop for the bus line between towns, currently in disuse. It has a couple of bins and direct access from the road.

title: (07170) Valldemossa - Carrer Tramuntana
description: The port of Valldemossa has a very quiet parking lot at night. Very pleasant place a few meters from the water. Very difficult access for a motorhome over 7 m and 2.30 m high, almost impossible crossing and maneuvering in all the hairpins.!!

title: (07609) Llucmajor - 10B Carrer de l'Acàcia
description: Quietest spot in the region to stay overnight! Quite ok if you have to go to the airport early the day after :) Mirador Son Veri as a small vantage point within walking distance!

title: (07190) Esporles - Ma-1100 / Granja De Esporles
description: Free parking day and night next to Granja de Esporlas. Quiet place in the Sierra de Tramuntana.

title: (07609) Llucmajor - 3 Carrer Lledoner
description: Quite large parking and with a lot of free space. On the road where you arrive earlier there is another car park with the same characteristics. It has containers.

title: (07609) Llucmajor - 24 Carrer de l'Acàcia
description: Parking at the bottom of the street. Sea view.

title: (07315) Escorca - Ma-10
description: Parking next to the road ... one flat place and two with a slight incline ... two nights of quiet and waking up with the cowbells of the animals ...

title: (07110) Bunyola - 3 Carrer Costa i Llobera
description: Place to rest or spend the night, without services, two or three motorhomes fit during the week, on a weekend full of cars, hiking trails and MTB, on the weekend cars and motorcycles do not stop passing the road is stuck but x the night very quiet, source of water

title: (07609) Llucmajor - 10 Carrer del Tamarinde
description: Great and quiet spot in winter. I guess during season it will be crowded. people drive here to enjoy view on the sea and sunset. so in the evening there is activity but in the night I was the only one. one road west is a big garbage container.

title: (07109) Sóller -
description: Parking of the viewpoint, at night there is a good place to park, by day, in summer it is full. Very quiet at night

title: (07315) Escorca - 2 Ma-10
description: Parking overlooking lake

title: (07315) Escorca - 2 Ma-10
description:
Parking lot for about ten cars, toillete, fresh water, tables and banches.
Good starting point for hiking, sometimes loud Traffics

title: (07109) Fornalutx - Ma-10
description: Leisure area with plenty of space for parking, playground for children.

title: (07144) Costitx - 9 CamÍ de Son Bernat
description: Parking of the astronomical observatory. quiet despite regular flights from 5h to 23h. visit of the observatory possible Friday and Saturday evening at 20h. reservation 34649997752.

title: (07181) Calvià - 43 Carretera Andratx
description: Free public parking 24h a 10min walk to the coves of Ses Illetes. Repsol next door with water and a picnic table. Quiet place to sleep.

title: (07108) - 45 Calle Poligono 1
description: Ora blue zone public car park. Monday to Saturday from 10 a.m. to 7 p.m. subject to a charge.

title: (07109) Fornalutx - Ma-10
description: Good starting point for the hike to Penyal des Migdia peaks. Didn't stay there as there are better places nearby

title: (07313) Selva - Unnamed Road
description: There is an old ruin on top of the mountain with benches, tables and a picnic area for grilling and everything. There is also enough parking space.

title: (07108) - 7 Calle Poligono 1
description: We had a very quiet couple of nights. Parking is paid from Monday to Saturday from 10am to 7pm. In the next plot there are chickens and roosters, for children it can be entertaining. On a tray next to the garden they leave tomatoes and vegetables for you to pick. No views but ideal. Close to the beach, bars and restaurants.

title: (07108) Port de Soller - 6 Calle Poligono 1
description: Paid parking from 10:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. At the back against the wall, place in the shade if available. 100m from the beach with free shower. Other hot showers and WC available at the Marina 15min walk along the bay.

title: (07300) Inca - 4 Carrer de Joan Dauder
description:
Laundry with 14kg and 18kg machines and 5 tumble dryers. Open 365 days, from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m.
Payable with coins, money changer available. Detergent (Ariel) is included in the price and will be added automatically - unfortunately you cannot use your own.

title: (07300) Inca - 4 Carrer de Joan Dauder
description: Vacant lot on the immediate edge of the city, about ten minutes walk from the center, very well placed, extremely quiet. no service, but very practical

title: (07100) Sóller - 24 Polígon de Sa Platja
description: Next to the beach, a water fountain where you can park to refill bottles, etc.

title: (07300) Inca - 57 Carrer Maó
description: Parking on the road. Very quiet area with 2 places. In front of a Children's Park and athletics track also with views of the Serra de Tramumtana 10 minutes from Inca on foot

title: (07108) Port de Sóller - 1 Carrer d'Antoni Montis
title_short: (07108) Port de Sóller - 1 Carrer d'Antoni Montis
description: Public shower on the beach. Good site

title: (07181) Calvià - 831 Carrer 831
description: Shaded parking area no problem to park beach at 1.4km

title: (07108) Port de Sóller - 7 Carrer de la Marina
title_short: (07108) Port de Sóller - 7 Carrer de la Marina
description: Free public hot showers and toilets in the middle of the docks. Really clean facilities and very central. The surrounding area is lovely too, lots of bars, restaraunts and cafes.

title: (07108) Port de Sóller - 2 Carrer Poeta Mossèn Costa i Llobera
title_short: (07108) Port de Sóller - 2 Carrer Poeta Mossèn Costa i Llobera
description: Tap so you can fill a watering can or jerry can with water

address.street: 2 Carrer Poeta Mossèn Costa i Llobera

title: (07108) Port de Sóller - 18 Carrer de Jaume Torrens
title_short: (07108) Port de Sóller - 18 Carrer de Jaume Torrens
description: Self-service laundry next to a supermarket, restaurants and cafeterias

title: (07108) Port de Sóller - 4 Carrer de Mestral
title_short: (07108) Port de Sóller - 4 Carrer de Mestral
description: drinking fountain

title: (07181) Calvià - 3 Calle 823 Bendinat Centre
description: Municipal car park accessible 24 hours a day. Quiet at night. Large space available.

title: (07108) Port de Sóller - 15T Plaça de Reis de Mallorca
title_short: (07108) Port de Sóller - 15T Plaça de Reis de Mallorca
description: Parking paid per day in a sports area 400 meters from the beach promenade and very close to the train to Soller.

title: (07108) Sóller - 7 Plaça de Reis de Mallorca
title_short: (07108) Sóller - 7 Plaça de Reis de Mallorca
description: Quiet street we spent two nights, near the port and the beach

title: (07108) Sóller - 9b Camí des Cingle
description: Free parking with trees, only about 50 m from the port

title: (07620) - 190 Lugar Poligono 11
description:
We offer the land of our house for camping travelers. It is a flat and spacious land with some large carob trees.
We have a large pool, children's trampoline and access to bathroom with shower.
We are 5 minutes from the town of Llucmajor and 30 minutes from the capital, Palma.
Ask for availability

title: (07108) Port de Sóller - 356 Calle Poligono 1
description: We have spent the night with another camper next to us, impressive views over the port of Soler and the lighthouse, unforgettable. We stayed there because the upper part of the lighthouse was full of campers and vans, but without regret it was beautiful. With care, you can get on and off without a problem with a camper, although it fills up at sunset, then empties out. Recommended.

title: (07210) Castellitx de la Pau - Unnamed Road
title_short: (07210) Castellitx de la Pau - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of the hermitage of Castellitx de la Pau. Quite away from the main road. Very quiet area. In the afternoon, people come to walk/play sports.

title: (07108) Port de Sóller - 357 Calle Poligono 1
description: Beautiful spot. Great sunset. A camper and three Bullis were parked overnight. The hiking trail towards Deia is incredibly beautiful. We recommend!

title: (07108) Sóller - 58 Carrer de Mestral
description: Nice quiet street elevated above Port de Sóller. Trees provide shade and you can walk to the harbor in 5 minutes, but you have to walk up the hill.

title: (07315) Escorca - Ma-10
description: Nice picnic area next to the lake.

title: (07518) Lloret de Vistalegre - p343 Camí des Cementírí
title_short: (07518) Lloret de Vistalegre - p343 Camí des Cementírí
description: Municipal sports center parking area with services, old camping area (Covid eye) possibility of excursions in the communal municipality forest (on foot, or by bike)

title: (07629) Algaida - 30 Carrer de la Iglésia
description: Parking on the outskirts

title: (07190) Son Coll -
description: Beautiful spot with a view for a van. In a curve of a lonely street.

title: (07300) Inca - 1 Diseminado Poligono 8
description: Butane and propane cylinders available

title: (07314) Selva - 30 Diseminado Poligono 13
description: Ample and paved parking next to the ethnological park. Very quiet and 300 meters from the urban center.

title: (07191) Banyalbufar - Ma-10
description: Nice place to sleep, high up in the neck, with great views. Room for 2-3 vans. There is a small natural wall that prevents you from being seen from the road and prevents noise.

title: (07314) Caimari - 1A Plaça Major
description: Quite place

title: (07629) Algaida - Ma-5018
description: Parking of the sanctuary of Cura. In the monastery there are toilets, they can be closed at night. It has a restaurant and wonderful views of the entire island. The only drawback, the presence of mosquitoes, although in the parking lot in principle, there is less.

title: (07190) Banyalbufar - Ma-10
description: At the edge of the ma10, km n84 in front of the milestone, shaded area, quiet. The cars on the road are few at night, and we spent 2 night very quiet, cool. Small waste collection before leaving, it's clean for the next. Be careful when entering, small drop to pass slowly.

title: (07181) Portals Nous - 43 Carrer Miguel de Cervantes
title_short: (07181) Portals Nous - 43 Carrer Miguel de Cervantes
description: Public water point. If you use a "washing machine adaptor" (buy in most hardware shops) you can connect your hose directly to the tap.

title: (07313) Escorca - 47 Ma-2130
description: Parking almost flat in a hairpin of the road. We had a comfortable night there. Frequent passages of passenger vehicles during the day, in the evening it becomes much quieter. Place for 3 vans maximu, difficult to access with a motorhome. Right next to the beautiful climbing gardens of Caimari.

title: (07181) Calvià - 156 Carretera Palma-andratx
description: Free public parking. Less than 15 minutes from the port of Palma. Part of the places have a roof that gives shade (here only small vans). There is a small shopping area very close, with restaurants. Still, it is quite quiet.

title: (07315) Escorca - Ma-10
description: A quiet place to stay in the middle of mountains right by the lake. The road is lightly trafficked at night.

title: (07300) Inca -
description: Picnic area about 1 km before sleeping. Fits a van. Several places available almost flat. Protected by trees.

title: (07629) Algaida - 503 Ma-5018
description: Nice view, a bit of aircraft noise, theoretically limited to 2.5t (had no problems with 3.5t) -> police came by and tolerated camping for 1 day

title: (07629) Algaida -
description: Away from the street on the Randa. Only partially suitable for larger motorhomes. At the weekend it gets crowded and noisy youngsters can come in the evenings.

title: (07300) Inca - Carretera de Santa Magdelena
description: Just beautiful

title: (07629) Algaida - Ma-5018
description: A great place to stay. During the day some cars and cyclists on the way to the monastery. Magnificent view over the valley. You can spend the night in the monastery parking lot. Keep the area clean!

title: (07191) Banyalbufar - 16 Diseminado Palma Cr
description: Car park for the Cami de Baix hike

title: (07313) Escorca - 47 Ma-2130
description: Sa coveta negra recreational area, quiet place under the pines. Very good for an overnight stay

title: (07620) Llucmajor - 70 Ronda de Migjorn
description: There is a small launderette here, there is also a vacuum cleaner and fresh water from a 3/4 inch faucet. The entrance is limited in height on one side, on the other side you can even get into the yard with trucks. The burger shop next door is fantastically delicious, perfect for waiting for the fresh laundry

title: (07191) Banyalbufar - 11 Camí des Molí
description: Here is a small shaded parking for vehicles (such as ours) that can not go down to the lower spot :-) We had a quiet night. Be careful not to arrive too late because the car park is full at night (many hotels). We were at the far end of the car park and had the chance to have a place close to a tree and suddenly a little room to take our meals outside, without disturbing the parking of other vehicles.

title: (07184) Calvià - 8 Camino Font
description: Here is a small place in the middle of nature. We stayed here for one night without a problem. There are no signs indicating private property, however it may be one. RAMMAS YOUR WASTE! First places of the island that is not filled !!!

title: (07609) Puigderrós - 27A Carrer de la Milana
description: Parking lot for excursionists, free of charge now in January 2022, super calm, I only hear the shallow sea that breaks on the rocks about 100m below. Great view, no service.

title: (07609) Llucmajor - Carrer de l'Oronella
description: Small picnic area, quiet with the sea close, quiet at night but a bit of people in the morning.

title: (07316) Selva - 1 Calle Zona Deportiva
description: Quiet car park. At the cost of a children's park and soccer field. We were in January and the toilets were closed. Drinking water to the park. Cap sign prohibiting overnight stays. Super quiet. Walking 2 minutes there is bakery, supermarket, restaurant, bathroom.

title: (07609) Puigderrós - 6 Carrer del Voltor
description: Very quiet place, beautiful sea view. To take a bath 2 minutes on foot

title: (07191) Banyalbufar - 3 Diseminado Estellencs Cr
description: Very large ground parking, with some trees, although they are small, they provide shade. Bañalbufar beach is small and made of stones. To get there you have to walk through the town and go down the streets for 15 minutes. It is a very curious cove!

title: (07195) Puigpunyent - 8 Camí es Rafal
description: Municipal parking without shade and flat ground

title: (07195) - 618 Lugar Net
description: Very quiet place to spend the night and camp.

title: (07300) Inca - Unnamed Road
description: Stop area, not for very long stays, for a car to see nature in its purest state.

title: (07609) Llucmajor - 54 Carrer de Barcelona
description: Parking under the pines. Pleasant shade and during the day the sea breeze arrives.
